statements: UPDATE food_preferences SET like_level = 5 WHERE person_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE food_preferences SET food_name = 'Pizza', dislike_reason = 'Too greasy' WHERE person_id = '456e89b7-12d3-a456-4266-14174000e8f';
UPDATE food_preferences SET like_level = 5, dislike_reason = 'Too spicy' WHERE person_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE food_preferences SET food_name = 'Sushi', like_level = 4 WHERE person_id = '56789abc-def0-1234-abcd-0123456789ab';
UPDATE food_preferences SET favorite_fruits='apples', favorite_veggies='broccoli' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE recipes SET instructions='Mix all ingredients and bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.', ingredients='eggs, flour, sugar' WHERE recipe_id=5;
UPDATE food_preferences SET favorite_fruits='Apples, Oranges, Bananas', dietary_restrictions='Vegetarian' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE recipes SET instructions='Mix all the ingredients in a bowl and bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.', ingredients='Flour, Sugar, Eggs, Milk' WHERE recipe_id=456;
UPDATE Users SET preference_id = 2 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE Recipes SET cuisine_type = 'Italian', ingredients = ARRAY['pasta', 'tomato sauce'], instructions = ARRAY['boil pasta', 'mix with sauce'] WHERE recipe_id = 5;
UPDATE Users SET preference_id = 5 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE Preferences SET fav_foods = 'Pizza, Pasta' WHERE preference_id = 3;
UPDATE Food_Preferences SET favorite_fruits = 'Apple, Banana', favorite_vegetables = 'Carrot, Spinach', favorite_protein = 'Chicken' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE Recipes SET instructions = 'Mix all ingredients and bake for 30 minutes.', difficulty_level = 'Easy' WHERE recipe_id = 101;
UPDATE Food_Preferences SET favorite_fruits = 'Apple, Banana', favorite_vegetables = 'Carrot, Spinach' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE Recipes SET ingredients = 'Chicken, Rice, Broccoli', difficulty_level = 'Medium' WHERE recipe_id = 5;
UPDATE Users SET full_name = 'John Doe', age = 30 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE Preferences SET favorite_cuisine = 'Italian', dietary_restrictions = ARRAY['Vegetarian'], preferred_ingredients = ARRAY['Tomatoes', 'Basil'] WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE Preferences SET favorite_cuisine = 'Italian', dietary_restrictions = ARRAY['Gluten Free', 'Vegetarian'] WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE Recipes SET instructions = 'Preheat the oven to 350F. Mix all ingredients together and bake for 30 minutes.' WHERE recipe_id = 456;
